name: Lazergoat: Invasion
description: Martians have invaded the Earth and enslaved our animals, but worst of all, they made Lazergoat angry. Now, he wants revenge!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10/Vista Processor: Pentium Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A DirectX 9 (or later) compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card, or integrated sound chip
